  physical_appearance: \This is an image of a publication \\The Orient Illustrated Weekly\\. The cover is a multicoloured portrait photograph of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose in his uniform posed against the tricoloured flag of India in the background. There are strips of brown colour on the top and green colour on the bottom of the cover. The title of the publication is printed on the top while the price and other information at the bottom. The spine of the publication is worn out.\

metadata.physical_appearance: "This is an image of a publication ""The Orient Illustrated Weekly"". The cover is a multicoloured portrait photograph of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose in his uniform posed against the tricoloured flag of India in the background. There are strips of brown colour on the top and green colour on the bottom of the cover. The title of the publication is printed on the top while the price and other information at the bottom. The spine of the publication is worn out."
